bug.author: Frank-Dz
bug.description:
I want to train the network with 1 channel input and 4 classes. I followedï¼š <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/issues/192>#192</denchmark-link>
Here, I modified the classes= 4. and change the filter. But my network still takes 3 channels until I set <denchmark-code> output_filters = [1] # input channels </denchmark-code>
in model.py Seems like the yolov3-spp.cfg does not make a difference for model creation. If it is not the right way, how can we modify the training scheme to support 1 channel input and 4 classes?
